extendedInfo.description: Fifteen for 2, fifteen for 4, and a Pair for 6! With AcesÂ® Cribbage you can hone your cribbage skills anywhere, even when youâre on the go. Aces Cribbage offers many game options including multiple counting styles, varying game speeds, and many different background combinations. With so many options, everyone can enjoy cribbage the way they like!With three difficulty levels this game can be enjoyed by players of any skill, from first time player to veteran. In-game tutorials, hints, and a glossary help new players learn the rules and strategies of cribbage. To top it all off, amazing graphics and realistic AI make this game challenging and fun for everyone, while statistics and online leaderboards make it easy to compete against your friends for the title of Cribbage Master.Game Features:â¢ Multiple ways to count your hand, including fast count, slow count, and auto countâ¢ Online Leaderboards: daily, weekly and overallâ¢ Separate Easy, Medium, and Hard Leaderboardsâ¢ Setting for the number of games to win a series â¢ Option for Mugginsâ¢ Hundreds of variations of Cribbage boards, pegs, and card design combinationsâ¢ New user tutorials and hintsâ¢ Glossary of commonly used Cribbage termsâ¢ Tracks tons of statistics including number of wins, losses, skunks, and the average point leadsâ¢ Competitive AIâ¦â¦â¦ Permissions requested and how they are used â¦â¦â¦â¢  android.permission.INTERNET: This permission is used to: 1) link to our website, 2) link to social networking like Twitter and Facebook, 3) update leaderboards, 4) collect gameplay data that we use to improve our games, and 5) allow ad networks that advertise within the app.â¢  android.permission.ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE: This permission is used primarily to check for a network connection before attempting to connect to our website.â¢  android.permission.WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE: This permission allows the app to access game data saved on an external storage device.â¢  android.permission.READ_PHONE_STATE: This permission allows the app to establish a unique ID for our leaderboards that can be used across all of our applications.â¢  android.permission.ACCESS_WIFI_STATE: This permission allows the app to establish a unique ID for our leaderboards for tablets that do not have telephone information.â¢  android.permission.VIBRATE: This permission is used to access vibration functionality on the device.

reviews.title: CPU always gets good hands
reviews.comment: It seems weird that the CPU always gets good hands and has the right card at the right time.  I\'m not saying the CPU cheats but it seems suspicious.   I have yet to beat the computer on medium difficulty.  The game is good otherwise.  Please add a way to disable the animation in the game options.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Best crib game on android
reviews.comment: Only two negatives:  1) cut animation is not cribbage standard. 2) when counting, the computer opponent doesn\'t show the crib cards.  Everything else is great.  Graphics are solid, game speed is good, ai is fine.  Definitely worth trying then buying imo.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Game play area too small
reviews.comment: Cannot play on HTC One. The game is scrunched in to 1/4 of the screen so too small to see.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: A good cribbage game, but CPU starts to get really good hands, especially if it gets skunked (on medium or hard settings). Otherwise, great game.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Love the game. Great graphics. Doesn\'t fit my 10\" tablet properly though.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not optimized well for HD
reviews.comment: I\'ve got an Asus Transformer 10\" tablet, and the game doesn\'t expand to cover the whole screen. It seems more set up for 7\" tablets. I\'d give it more stars if it fit the whole screen.
reviews.author: Laochailan Maghouin

reviews.comment: Background needd updating look off on the 8 inch tablet
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Bought it twice
reviews.comment: Bought it for my blackberry and now for my Samsung. Its that good
reviews.author: phreaking crow

reviews.title: Not HD enough
reviews.comment: The best cribbage app is not ready for big screens like the HTC one. Screen layout is a  mess. Uninstalled. Much sadness.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Huge computer bias
reviews.comment: Computer constantly gets amazing hands when you are winning the game.  Not even close to being realistic.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Itsy bitsy on Nexus 10
reviews.comment: App doesn\'t stretch to fill screen. Maybe  a later version will...
reviews.author: Brent DeGraaf
